name: Robot Rush (Chapers)
description:
W, A, S, D To Move

Shooting will automatically happen when the player is stationary. It will also fire at the closest enemy. 

This means you will have to decide on when to move and want to stop! 

Survive as many rounds as you can and upgrade your character at the end of each round, using the skill upgrade. 

This was made for the 2020 Epic Mega Jam! 

I had a goal to see how much I could do by myself in period of time given.  This was 7 days ( From the 4th to 11th of December 2020 ). Everything in this game was made in this time frame from scratch. From the Models, Blueprints, Textures, Drawing and even audio. 

If you have time to look at this game and give me feedback so I can improve my work I would appreciate it very much. If you can't, then thank you for visiting this page :)
